remarks: Change the domain of a measurability predicate.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
mbfss.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
mbfss.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom vol ) $.
mbfss.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
mbfss.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = 0 ) $.
mbfss.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfss $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
